---
title: "Among Top 2 Percent of Authors in Social Work"
author: "Andy Grogan-Kaylor"
date: "2024-2-15"
---

I am truly honored to learn that I am one of several faculty from the University of Michigan School of Social Work included in the 2024 list of the world's top 2% of scientists. The annual list was compiled by Stanford faculty and the analytics company Elsevier.
